elon-musk.label: Elon Musk
elon-musk.description: Elon Musk is a business magnate, industrial designer, and engineer. He is the founder, CEO, CTO, and chief designer of SpaceX; early investor, CEO, and product architect of Tesla, Inc.; founder of The Boring Company; co-founder of Neuralink; and co-founder and initial co-chairman of OpenAI.

barack-obama.label: Barack Obama
barack-obama.description: Barack Obama is an American politician who served as the 44th President of the United States from 2009 to 2017.

donald-trump.label: Donald Trump
donald-trump.description: Donald Trump is an American politician, media personality, and businessman who served as the 45th President of the United States from 2017 to 2021.

joe-biden.label: Joe Biden
joe-biden.description: Joe Biden is an American politician who is the 46th and current President of the United States.

bill-gates.label: Bill Gates
bill-gates.description: Bill Gates is an American business magnate, software developer, investor, and philanthropist. He is best known as the co-founder of Microsoft Corporation.

jeff-bezos.label: Jeff Bezos
jeff-bezos.description: Jeff Bezos is an American internet entrepreneur, industrialist, media proprietor, and investor. He is the founder and executive chairman of Amazon.

mark-zuckerberg.label: Mark Zuckerberg
mark-zuckerberg.description: Mark Zuckerberg is an American media magnate, internet entrepreneur, and philanthropist. He is known for co-founding Facebook, Inc. and serves as its chairman, chief executive officer, and controlling shareholder.

steve-jobs.label: Steve Jobs
steve-jobs.description: Steve Jobs was an American business magnate, industrial designer, investor, and media proprietor. He was the chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), and co-founder of Apple Inc.

taylor-swift.label: Taylor Swift
taylor-swift.description: Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter. Her narrative songwriting, which often centers around her personal life, has received widespread critical plaudits and media coverage.

snoop-dogg.label: Snoop Dogg
snoop-dogg.description: Snoop Dogg is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, producer, media personality, entrepreneur, and actor.

kanye-west.label: Kanye West
kanye-west.description: Kanye West is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer, and fashion designer.

michael-jackson.label: Michael Jackson
michael-jackson.description: Michael Jackson was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer.

billie-eilish.label: Billie Eilish
billie-eilish.description: Billie Eilish is an American singer and songwriter.

drake.label: Drake
drake.description: Drake is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter, actor, and entrepreneur.

eminem.label: Eminem
eminem.description: Eminem is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer.

travis-scott.label: Travis Scott
travis-scott.description: Travis Scott is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer.

elvis-presley.label: Elvis Presley
elvis-presley.description: Elvis Presley was an American singer and actor.

freddie-mercury.label: Freddie Mercury
freddie-mercury.description: Freddie Mercury was a British singer, songwriter, record producer, and lead vocalist of the rock band Queen.

ed-sheeran.label: Ed Sheeran
ed-sheeran.description: Ed Sheeran is an English singer, songwriter, musician, record producer, actor, and businessman.

ariana-grande.label: Ariana Grande
ariana-grande.description: Ariana Grande is an American singer and actress.

beyonce.label: Beyoncé
beyonce.description: Beyoncé is an American singer, songwriter, actress, and record producer.

lady-gaga.label: Lady Gaga
lady-gaga.description: Lady Gaga is an American singer, songwriter, and actress.

the-weeknd.label: The Weeknd
the-weeknd.description: The Weeknd is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer.

justin-bieber.label: Justin Bieber
justin-bieber.description: Justin Bieber is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and actor.

post-malone.label: Post Malone
post-malone.description: Post Malone is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer.

doja-cat.label: Doja Cat
doja-cat.description: Doja Cat is an American rapper, singer, and songwriter.

rihanna.label: Rihanna
rihanna.description: Rihanna is a Barbadian singer, actress, and businesswoman.

bruno-mars.label: Bruno Mars
bruno-mars.description: Bruno Mars is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, multi-instrumentalist, and dancer.

shakira.label: Shakira
shakira.description: Shakira is a Colombian singer, songwriter, dancer, record producer, choreographer, and model.

morgan-freeman.label: Morgan Freeman
morgan-freeman.description: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, director, and narrator. He is known for his distinctive deep voice and has appeared in a range of film genres.

arnold-schwarzenegger.label: Arnold Schwarzenegger
arnold-schwarzenegger.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger is an Austrian-American actor, businessman, former politician and professional bodybuilder. He served as the 38th Governor of California from 2003 to 2011.

samuel-l-jackson.label: Samuel L. Jackson
samuel-l-jackson.description: Samuel L. Jackson is an American actor and producer. One of the most widely recognized actors of his generation, the films in which he has appeared have collectively grossed over $27 billion worldwide, making him the highest-grossing actor of all time (excluding cameo appearances).

keanu-reeves.label: Keanu Reeves
keanu-reeves.description: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor. Born in Beirut and raised in Toronto, Reeves began acting in theatre productions and in television films before making his feature film debut in Youngblood (1986).

dwayne-the-rock-johnson.label: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson
dwayne-the-rock-johnson.description: Dwayne Douglas Johnson, also known by his ring name The Rock, is an American actor, businessman, and former professional wrestler.

christopher-walken.label: Christopher Walken
christopher-walken.description: Christopher Walken is an American actor and comedian, whose career has spanned over 50 years. He has appeared in over 100 films and television shows.

james-earl-jones-darth-vader-voice.label: James Earl Jones (Darth Vader voice)
james-earl-jones-darth-vader-voice.description: James Earl Jones is an American actor. His career spans more than seven decades and he has been described as 'one of America's most distinguished and versatile' actors and 'one of the greatest actors in American history'.

tom-hanks.label: Tom Hanks
tom-hanks.description: Thomas Jeffrey Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker. Known for both his comedic and dramatic roles, Hanks is one of the most popular and recognizable film stars worldwide, and is widely regarded as an American cultural icon.

robert-downey-jr.label: Robert Downey Jr.
robert-downey-jr.description: Robert John Downey Jr. is an American actor and producer. His career has been characterized by critical and popular success in his youth, followed by a period of substance abuse and legal troubles, before a resurgence of commercial success in middle age.

leonardo-dicaprio.label: Leonardo DiCaprio
leonardo-dicaprio.description: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor, film producer, and environmentalist. He has often played unconventional roles, particularly in biopics and period films.

johnny-depp.label: Johnny Depp
johnny-depp.description: John Christopher 'Johnny' Depp II is an American actor, producer, and musician. He has been nominated for ten Golden Globe Awards, winning one for Best Actor for his performance of the title role in Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007), and has been nominated for three Academy Awards for Best Actor, among other accolades.

will-smith.label: Will Smith
will-smith.description: Willard Carroll 'Will' Smith Jr. is an American actor, comedian, producer, rapper, and songwriter. He has enjoyed success in television, film, and music.

scarlett-johansson.label: Scarlett Johansson
scarlett-johansson.description: Scarlett Ingrid Johansson is an American actress and singer. The world's highest-paid actress since 2018, she has made multiple appearances in the Forbes Celebrity 100.

emma-watson.label: Emma Watson
emma-watson.description: Emma Charlotte Duerre Watson is an English actress, model, and activist. She has gained recognition for her roles in both blockbusters and independent films, as well as for her women's rights work.

jennifer-lawrence.label: Jennifer Lawrence
jennifer-lawrence.description: Jennifer Shrader Lawrence is an American actress. The films she has acted in have grossed over $6 billion worldwide, and she was the highest-paid actress in the world in 2015 and 2016.

chris-hemsworth.label: Chris Hemsworth
chris-hemsworth.description: Christopher Hemsworth is an Australian actor. He rose to prominence playing Kim Hyde in the Australian television series Home and Away (2004–2007) before beginning a film career in Hollywood.

ryan-reynolds.label: Ryan Reynolds
ryan-reynolds.description: Ryan Rodney Reynolds is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, film producer, and screenwriter. He began his career starring in the Canadian teen soap opera Hillside (1991–1993), and had minor roles before landing the lead role on the sitcom Two Guys and a Girl between 1998 and 2001.

jack-black.label: Jack Black
jack-black.description: Thomas Jacob 'Jack' Black is an American actor, comedian, musician, and songwriter. He is known for his roles in films such as High Fidelity (2000), Shallow Hal (2001), School of Rock (2003), King Kong (2005), The Holiday (2006), the Kung Fu Panda franchise (2008–present), Tropic Thunder (2008), Gulliver's Travels (2010), Bernie (2011), the Jumanji franchise (2017–present), and The House with a Clock in Its Walls (2018).

hugh-jackman.label: Hugh Jackman
hugh-jackman.description: Hugh Michael Jackman is an Australian actor, singer, and producer. He is best known for playing Wolverine/Logan in the X-Men film series (2000–2017), a role for which he holds the Guinness World Record for 'longest career as a live-action Marvel superhero'.

tom-cruise.label: Tom Cruise
tom-cruise.description: Tom Cruise is an American actor and producer.

daniel-radcliffe.label: Daniel Radcliffe
daniel-radcliffe.description: Daniel Radcliffe is an English actor.

al-pacino.label: Al Pacino
al-pacino.description: Al Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker.

robert-de-niro.label: Robert De Niro
robert-de-niro.description: Robert De Niro is an American actor, producer, and director.

clint-eastwood.label: Clint Eastwood
clint-eastwood.description: Clint Eastwood is an American actor, film director, composer, and producer.

jim-carrey.label: Jim Carrey
jim-carrey.description: Jim Carrey is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, writer, and producer.

angelina-jolie.label: Angelina Jolie
angelina-jolie.description: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian.

gal-gadot.label: Gal Gadot
gal-gadot.description: Gal Gadot is an Israeli actress and model.

homer-simpson-the-simpsons.label: Homer Simpson (The Simpsons)
homer-simpson-the-simpsons.description: Homer Simpson is a fictional character and the main protagonist of the American animated sitcom The Simpsons.

peter-griffin-family-guy.label: Peter Griffin (Family Guy)
peter-griffin-family-guy.description: Peter Griffin is a fictional character and the protagonist of the American animated sitcom Family Guy.

stewie-griffin-family-guy.label: Stewie Griffin (Family Guy)
stewie-griffin-family-guy.description: Stewie Griffin is a fictional character from the animated television series Family Guy.

optimus-prime-transformers.label: Optimus Prime (Transformers)
optimus-prime-transformers.description: Optimus Prime is a fictional character from the Transformers franchise.

mickey-mouse.label: Mickey Mouse
mickey-mouse.description: Mickey Mouse is a cartoon character created in 1928 by Walt Disney and Ub Iwerks.

bugs-bunny.label: Bugs Bunny
bugs-bunny.description: Bugs Bunny is an animated cartoon character, created in the late 1930s by Leon Schlesinger Productions (later Warner Bros. Cartoons).

shrek.label: Shrek
shrek.description: Shrek is a fictional ogre character created by American author William Steig.

gollum-lord-of-the-rings.label: Gollum (Lord of the Rings)
gollum-lord-of-the-rings.description: Gollum is a fictional character from J. R. R. Tolkien's legendarium.

rick-sanchez-rick-morty.label: Rick Sanchez (Rick & Morty)
rick-sanchez-rick-morty.description: Rick Sanchez is one of the two eponymous characters from the Adult Swim animated television series Rick and Morty.

morty-smith-rick-morty.label: Morty Smith (Rick & Morty)
morty-smith-rick-morty.description: Morty Smith is one of the title characters of the American animated television series Rick and Morty.

yoda-star-wars.label: Yoda (Star Wars)
yoda-star-wars.description: Yoda was a legendary Jedi Master and stronger than most in his connection with the Force.

patrick-star-spongebob.label: Patrick Star (SpongeBob)
patrick-star-spongebob.description: Patrick Star is a fictional character in the American animated television series SpongeBob SquarePants.

spongebobsquarepants.label: SpongeBob SquarePants
spongebobsquarepants.description: SpongeBob SquarePants is the titular character of the animated television series of the same name.

scooby-doo.label: Scooby-Doo
scooby-doo.description: Scooby-Doo is the eponymous character and protagonist of the animated television franchise of the same name.

batman-kevin-conroys-version.label: Batman (Kevin Conroy's version)
batman-kevin-conroys-version.description: Batman is a superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics.

joker-mark-hamills-version.label: Joker (Mark Hamill’s version)
joker-mark-hamills-version.description: The Joker is a supervillain created by Bill Finger, Bob Kane, and Jerry Robinson who first appeared in the debut issue of the comic book Batman (April 25, 1940).

pikachu-pokemon.label: Pikachu (Pokémon)
pikachu-pokemon.description: Pikachu are a species of Pokémon, fictional creatures that appear in an assortment of video games, animated television shows and movies, trading card games, and comic books licensed by The Pokémon Company, a Japanese corporation.

goofy-disney.label: Goofy (Disney)
goofy-disney.description: Goofy is a funny animal cartoon character created in 1932 at Walt Disney Productions.

eric-cartman-south-park.label: Eric Cartman (South Park)
eric-cartman-south-park.description: Eric Theodore Cartman is a main character in the animated television series South Park.

joe-rogan.label: Joe Rogan
joe-rogan.description: Joe Rogan is an American comedian, podcast host, and mixed martial arts color commentator.

stephen-colbert.label: Stephen Colbert
stephen-colbert.description: Stephen Colbert is an American comedian, writer, producer, political commentator, actor, and television host.

oprah-winfrey.label: Oprah Winfrey
oprah-winfrey.description: Oprah Winfrey is an American media executive, actress, talk show host, television producer, and philanthropist.

gordon-ramsay.label: Gordon Ramsay
gordon-ramsay.description: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef, restaurateur, television personality, and writer.

howard-stern.label: Howard Stern
howard-stern.description: Howard Stern is an American radio and television personality, comedian, and author.

ellen-degeneres.label: Ellen DeGeneres
ellen-degeneres.description: Ellen DeGeneres is an American comedian, television host, actress, writer, and producer.

john-oliver.label: John Oliver
john-oliver.description: John Oliver is a British comedian, writer, producer, political commentator, actor, and television host.

conan-obrien.label: Conan O'Brien
conan-obrien.description: Conan O'Brien is an American television host, comedian, writer, and producer.

jay-leno.label: Jay Leno
jay-leno.description: Jay Leno is an American comedian, actor, writer, producer, and television host.

jimmy-fallon.label: Jimmy Fallon
jimmy-fallon.description: Jimmy Fallon is an American comedian, television host, actor, and musician.

pewdiepie.label: PewDiePie
pewdiepie.description: PewDiePie is a Swedish YouTuber, comedian, and video game commentator.

mrbeast.label: MrBeast
mrbeast.description: MrBeast is an American YouTuber, internet personality, businessman, and philanthropist.

markiplier.label: Markiplier
markiplier.description: Markiplier is an American YouTuber, gamer-commentator, actor, and comedian.

corpsehusband.label: Corpse Husband
corpsehusband.description: Corpse Husband is an American YouTuber and musician.

ninjatylerblevins.label: Ninja (Tyler Blevins)
ninjatylerblevins.description: Ninja is an American professional gamer and streamer.

drdisrespect.label: Dr Disrespect
drdisrespect.description: Dr Disrespect is an American video-game streamer.

pokimane.label: Pokimane
pokimane.description: Pokimane is a Moroccan-Canadian Internet personality.

xqc.label: XQC
xqc.description: XQC is a Canadian Twitch streamer and internet personality.

jacksepticeye.label: Jacksepticeye
jacksepticeye.description: Jacksepticeye is an Irish YouTuber, best known for his vlogs and comedic Let's Play series.

dreamminecraftyoutuber.label: Dream (Minecraft YouTuber)
dreamminecraftyoutuber.description: Dream is an American YouTuber and Twitch streamer who is known primarily for creating Minecraft content.

narendra-modi.label: Narendra Modi
narendra-modi.description: Narendra Modi is an Indian politician serving as the 14th and current Prime Minister of India since 2014. He is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and has been recognized for his leadership and development-focused governance.

david-attenborough.label: David Attenborough
david-attenborough.description: Sir David Attenborough is an English broadcaster and natural historian. He is best known for writing and presenting, in conjunction with the BBC Natural History Unit, the nine natural history documentary series forming the Life collection that together constitute a comprehensive survey of animal and plant life on Earth.

benedict-cumberbatch.label: Benedict Cumberbatch
benedict-cumberbatch.description: Benedict Timothy Carlton Cumberbatch is an English actor. Known for his work on screen and stage, he has received various accolades, including a British Academy Television Award, a Primetime Emmy Award, a Laurence Olivier Award, and nominations for two Academy Awards, two British Academy Film Awards, and four Golden Globe Awards.

vladimir-putin.label: Vladimir Putin
vladimir-putin.description: Vladimir Putin is a Russian politician and former intelligence officer who is the current president of Russia.
